::Zardus::

Zardus watches Composer and Wheeljack depart and then walks back to 
the bridge, instinctively glancing at several reports. He frowns, 
seeing that one of the rooms of the Alliance base had failed to be 
monitored.

Zardus taps a few keys, initiating a scan to find exactly which bots 
were in the room.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Bumblebee/
> Injector:
> 
> 
> 
> The nine robots began to converse freely, a jamming singal 
eminating from a 
> device on a table that blocked all cameras and listening devices in 
one of 
> the rooms in the Alliance base.
